products.name: OPPO f19
products.aboutMobile: Oppo F19 mobile was launched on 6th April 2021. The phone comes with a 6.43-inch touchscreen display with a resolution of 1080x2400 pixels and an aspect ratio of 20:9. Oppo F19 is powered by an octa-core Qualcomm Snapdragon 662 processor. It comes with 6GB of RAM.
